page.title: 01A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KATHI
page.content: {June 13th.1985.} Morning. I got up at 7.00am and got dressed. Usually I would put on my school uniform but today we were going to Hill End Camp,a nature reserve in Farmoor.I put on some jeans,a shirt and a jumper. Then I went downstairs to have my breakfast of cereal and toast.I sat watching T.V while I ate and drank my tea.Then I fed the cat and did the washing-up.My 2 sisters were just going to school when Julia(one of them) realised I had her jeans on.She made me change.Then after taking the dog for a walk I locked-up and went down to Judie's getting my bike out on the way. I go down to Judie's whenever the house is empty.At about 8.35am I left to cycle to school.When I got there I had a quick game of tennis with Ellen.When we got to Hill End we went for a walk looking for plants/insects until lunch.
